properties.description: Curated layer used by PBI for the master data map table

source:
%%sql

 --CREATE VIEW FOR IMS Information Asset PBI Report

 CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_IMS_MasterDataMap
 AS


SELECT
	MasterdataMapIDLegacy                                   AS master_data_map_id,
	IMSMasterdataMapName                                    AS master_data_map_name,
	IsItIMSMasterdata                                       AS is_master_data,
	replace(MasterdataMapInformationOwner, ''', '''')  AS mdm_information_owner,
    MasterdataMapInformationExpert                          AS mdm_information_expert,
	MasterDataVolumeOfRecords                               AS volume_of_records,
	MasterdataMapType                                       AS type,
	MasterdataMapStatus                                     AS status,
	MasterdataMapPriority                                   AS priority,
	MasterdataMapResolution                                 AS resolution,
	NULL                                                    AS work_log,
	BCDAttributeNumber                                      AS fk_attribute_id,
	IMSIAID                                                 AS fk_asset_id,
	IMSMasterdataMapDateModified                            AS date_modified

FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_masterdata_map_dim

GO
